page.title: 14CULLOMPTON INFANT SCHOOL
page.content: Children start at Willowbank,built in 1980,for children 5_7 years.237 children have 7_5 teachers and 3 ancillary helpers.They have an adventure playground,pond,television and video,2 computers,film_strip projectors and cameras as well as the usual equipment.80_90 school dinners are provided daily by a cook and 2 helpers. They learn to read and write,have maths and science and other lessons. They have recorder,gardening,country_ dancing and P.E.clubs.If children misbehave they may miss playtime,do some weeding,pick up litter,or tidy classrooms.If they hurt someone they might have to write a letter of apology. A sports'day has been introduced as children enjoy competition.Links are kept with playgroups and Junior School
